verses.verse: And when the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H8088>fame<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> concerning the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, she <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5254>prove<s%> him with hard <S%H2420>questions<s%>.

And she <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H2428>train<s%>, with <S%H1581>camels<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%>, and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>: and when she was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, she <S%H1696>communed<s%> with him of all that was in her <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> her all her <S%H1697>questions<s%>: there was not any <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%>, which he <S%H5046>told<s%> her not. questions: Heb. words
And when the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> all <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> that he had <S%H1129>built<s%>,

And the <S%H3978>meat<s%> of his <S%H7979>table<s%>, and the <S%H4186>sitting<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and the <S%H4612>attendance<s%> of his <S%H8334>ministers<s%>, and their <S%H4403>apparel<s%>, and his <S%H8248>cupbearers<s%>, and his <S%H5930>ascent<s%> by which he went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; there was no more <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in her. attendance: Heb. standing cupbearers: or, butlers

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, It was a <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H1697>report<s%> that I <S%H8085>heard<s%> in mine own <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H1697>acts<s%> and of thy <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>. report: Heb. word acts: or, sayings

Howbeit I <S%H539>believed<s%> not the <S%H1697>words<s%>, until I <S%H935>came<s%>, and mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> it: and, behold, the <S%H2677>half<s%> was not <S%H5046>told<s%> me: thy <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> <S%H3254>exceedeth<s%> the <S%H8052>fame<s%> which I <S%H8085>heard<s%>. thy: Heb. thou hast added wisdom and goodness to

<S%H835>Happy<s%> are thy <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H835>happy<s%> are these thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, which <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and that <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, which <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in thee, to <S%H5414>set<s%> thee on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H160>loved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, therefore <S%H7760>made<s%> he thee <S%H4428>king<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%>.

And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and of <S%H1314>spices<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> great <S%H7235>store<s%>, and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>: there <S%H935>came<s%> no more <S%H1931>such<s%> <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H1314>spices<s%> as these which the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

And the <S%H590>navy<s%> also of <S%H2438>Hiram<s%>, that <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H211>Ophir<s%>, brought <S%H935>in<s%> from <S%H211>Ophir<s%> <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7235>plenty<s%> of <S%H484>almug<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> of the <S%H484>almug<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H4552>pillars<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H3658>harps<s%> also and <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> for <S%H7891>singers<s%>: there <S%H935>came<s%> no such <S%H484>almug<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, nor were <S%H7200>seen<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>. pillars: or, rails: Heb. a prop

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> all her <S%H2656>desire<s%>, whatsoever she <S%H7592>asked<s%>, beside that which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her of his <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H3027>bounty<s%>. So she <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to her own <S%H776>country<s%>, she and her <S%H5650>servants<s%>. of his: Heb. according to the hand of king Solomon

Now the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>,

Beside that he had of the <S%H582>merchantmen<s%> <S%H8446><s%>, and of the <S%H4536>traffick<s%> of the spice <S%H7402>merchants<s%>, and of all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6153>Arabia<s%>, and of the <S%H6346>governors<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>. governors: or, captains

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6793>targets<s%> of <S%H7820>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6793>target<s%>.

And he made <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4043>shields<s%> of <S%H7820>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>; <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H4488>pound<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4043>shield<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with the <S%H6338>best<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

The <S%H3678>throne<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>, and the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H3678>throne<s%> was <S%H5696>round<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%>: and there were <S%H3027>stays<s%> on either side on the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7675>seat<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H3027>stays<s%>. behind: Heb. on the hinder part thereof stays: Heb. hands

And <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> there on the one side and on the other upon the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>: there was not the <S%H3651>like<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> in any <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>. the like: Heb. so

And all <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H4945>drinking<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> were of <S%H5462>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>; none were of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: it was <S%H3972>nothing<s%> <S%H2803>accounted<s%> of in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>. none: or, there was no silver in them

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> had at <S%H3220>sea<s%> a <S%H590>navy<s%> of <S%H8659>Tharshish<s%> with the <S%H590>navy<s%> of <S%H2438>Hiram<s%>: <S%H259>once<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H590>navy<s%> of <S%H8659>Tharshish<s%>, <S%H5375>bringing<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H8143>ivory<s%>, and <S%H6971>apes<s%>, and <S%H8500>peacocks<s%>. ivory: or, elephants' teeth
So <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1431>exceeded<s%> all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H6239>riches<s%> and for <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.

And all the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, to <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>. sought to: Heb. sought the face of

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4503>present<s%>, <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H8008>garments<s%>, and <S%H5402>armour<s%>, and <S%H1314>spices<s%>, <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H6505>mules<s%>, a <S%H1697>rate<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>: and he had a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, whom he <S%H5148>bestowed<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> to be in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H730>cedars<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> he to be as the sycomore <S%H8256>trees<s%> that are in the <S%H8219>vale<s%>, for <S%H7230>abundance<s%>. made: Heb. gave

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H4161>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and linen <S%H4723>yarn<s%>: the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5503>merchants<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> the linen <S%H4723>yarn<s%> at a <S%H4242>price<s%>. And Solomon: Heb. And the going forth of the horses which was Solomon's

And a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and an <S%H5483>horse<s%> for an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>: and so for all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and for the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, did they bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> by their <S%H3027>means<s%>. by their: Heb. by their hand
